description.value: Thrown weapons become especially deadly in your fury. You apply the additional damage from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Rage] to your thrown weapon attacks. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Brutal Critical] feat or the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Devastator] class feature, apply their benefits to thrown weapon attacks.
